price: 1. Ta. Sin[724]. Estas son las aleyas del Corán, un Libro esclarecedor,
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: [724]  Ver la nota de pie de la aleya 1 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
